long_description: Built for runs in warm weather, the men's Sugoi Titan 2-in-1 Shorts feature a very lightweight, breathable shell and a built-in liner to keep you cool when you're reaching your fitness goals. Lightweight shell fabric provides breathability that wicks moisture and dries quickly, keeping you comfortable even when you're working hard. Liner dries quickly and wicks moisture and keeps you cooler during hot weather. Elastic waistband with a stretchy drawcord provides a personalized fit. The men's Sugoi Titan 2-in-1 shorts feature a rear zip pocket and internal pocket that safely stows keys, ID or a small media player. Closeout.
short_description: Built for runs in warm weather, the men's Sugoi Titan 2-in-1 Shorts feature a very lightweight, breathable shell and a built-in liner to keep you cool when you're reaching your fitness goals.
